author: Giorgio Locatelli
method: Bring a pot of salted water to the boil and add the spaghetti. Cook until the spaghetti is soft but still has a little bite. While the spaghetti is cooking, remove the seeds from the chillies and finely chop. Peel and finely chop the garlic.  Heat the olive oil in a large frying pan. Cook the garlic and chillies gently for a few minutes.  Drain the spaghetti and add to the frying pan, mix to coat with the oil.  Sprinkle the spaghetti with the parsley, season with salt and serve.
ingredients: 400g/14oz spaghetti,  3 fresh red chillies,  3 garlic cloves,  5 tbsp extra virgin olive oil ,  1 tbsp chopped flatleaf parsley ,  salt
